title: Barbecue Jamaican Chicken
ingredients: ['1 large red onion', '3 cloves garlic', '1 Scotch bonnet chilli, seeded', '1 (3cm) piece fresh root ginger', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '4 tablespoons dark brown soft sugar', '3 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '3 tablespoons orange juice', '1 teaspoon soy sauce', '2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1/4 teaspoon ground cloves', '1 (25g) pack coriander, chopped', '1/2 teaspoon salt and pepper to taste', '6 skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets']
